title: Edible Paper Printing
subtitle: Bring your images to life on our high-quality edible sugar paper. Perfect for personalizing cakes, cupcakes, and cookies.

details.title: Printing Details
details.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started.

fileTypes.title: File Types
fileTypes.description: We accept PDF, JPG, and PNG files. For best results, please provide high-resolution images.

quality.title: Image Quality
quality.description: The final print quality depends on your original image. We recommend a resolution of at least 300 DPI.

pricing.title: Sizing & Pricing
pricing.description: We print on A4 edible sheets for 250 CZK per page. We can help you arrange multiple smaller images on a single sheet.

request.title: Request a Print
request.subtitle: Fill out the form below, and we'll get back to you with a confirmation and payment details.

notes.label: Notes
notes.placeholder: Any special instructions? e.g., 'I need two circles, 10cm in diameter, from this image.'

altEmail.text: Alternatively, you can email your file and instructions to
